sentences.sContent: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness.
sentences.sCn: 该中心对精神病患者提供帮助。

sentences.sContent: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health.
sentences.sCn: 压力对身体健康和心理健康都有影响。

sentences.sContent: ...What mattered most was the residents’ physical health and mental status...
...Innovators engage in these mental activities regularly...
...someone who knows you well enough to show you how your mental life is getting in the way of good writing...
...and caring for a spouse with mental disorder can leave you with some of the same severe problems...
...Campus construction is of vital importance not only to the physical development of students but to their mental health as well...

phrases.pCn: 智力迟钝；智能缺陷（等于mental deficiency）
心智发展；心理发展过程
心智模式，心智模型；心理模型
n. 精神境界，精神面貌
心智能力；智能；心理能力

remMethod.val: ment(想， 心智) ＋ al(…的) → 精神的

words.tran: 心态；[心理] 智力；精神力；头脑作用
心理状态；精神作用；精神活动

trans.tranOther: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind
